name: Dell Vostro 15 3500 Core i3 11th Gen
processor: Intel Core i3-1115G4 (6MB Cache, 3.0 GHz up to 4.10 GHz)
description: The Dell Vostro 15 3500 Laptop comes with the Intel Core i3-1115G4 Processor (6MB Cache, 3.0 GHz up to 4.10 GHz) and 4GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM. It has a 1TB 5400 rpm 2.5-inch SATA Hard Drive. It is featured with Intel UHD Graphics with shared graphics memory. It has a 15.6-inch FHD (1920x1080), 60 Hz, Anti-glare, NTSC 45%, 220 Nits, LED Backlight Non-touch WVA Display. It features built-in Qualcomm DW1810 2.4/5GHz WiFi w/BT4.1 and Bluetooth. It comes with 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (Data only), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x Ethernet RJ-45, 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1x Headset Jack, 1x Power In ports and 1x 3-in-1 SD Media Card Reader, 1x Wedge-Shaped Lock Slot. It is powered by 3-Cell, 42 WHr, Integrated battery. Dell Vostro 15 3500 Core i3 Laptop has 3 years of warranty.
